name: may-the-4th-be-russo
description: Wedding website for Megan Bailey & Randy Russo
author: Tony Greeley

scripts.bs: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:server && npm run start:prod
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run install:dev && npm run build && npm prune && cd ..
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run install:dev && npm run build && npm prune
